title: Global sulfur production by country 2019
yAxis: Price in U.S. dollars per ton
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in U.S. dollars per ton for 23 number of Countrys.
The maximum Price in U.S. dollars per ton 17400.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Brazil where Country is 500.0.
The Price in U.S. dollars per ton of Country China is 34.8% larger than the minimum value at Brazil.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Price in U.S. dollars per ton in the y axis.
The maximum Price in U.S. dollars per ton 17400.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Brazil where Country is 500.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in U.S. dollars per ton for 23 number of Countrys.
The maximum Price in U.S. dollars per ton 17400.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Brazil where Country is 500.0.
The Price in U.S. dollars per ton of Country China is 34.8% larger than the minimum value at Brazil.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in U.S. dollars per ton for 23 number of Countrys.
The Price in U.S. dollars per ton is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Brazil.
Country United States has the second highest value for Price in U.S. dollars per ton.
There is a difference of 16900.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Brazil.
Price in U.S. dollars per ton at Country China is 17400.0 , second place is United States at 8800.0, and thirdly is Russia at 7100.0.
Country United Arab Emirates, India, and Japan share the same value 3400.0.
The average Price in U.S. dollars per ton in all 23 Countrys is 3430.87.
